title: RBI Hikes Repo Rate Amidst Inflation Concerns

content.detailed: The Reserve Bank of India increased the repo rate by 25 basis points to 6.75% to tackle rising inflation. The move is expected to impact loan EMIs and borrowing costs for businesses.
content.prelims: RBI hikes repo rate by 25 bps to 6.75%.
content.mains: Discuss the impact of RBI's repo rate hike on the Indian economy and inflation control.
content.oneLiner: RBI raises repo rate to curb inflation.

title: ISRO Successfully Launches Gaganyaan Test Flight

content.detailed: ISRO's Gaganyaan test flight marks a major milestone in India's human spaceflight program. The mission tested crew module separation and re-entry systems.
content.prelims: Gaganyaan test flight by ISRO successful.
content.mains: Explain the significance of Gaganyaan for India's space ambitions.

title: India Signs Free Trade Agreement with UK

content.detailed: India and the UK have signed a comprehensive free trade agreement, aiming to boost bilateral trade by reducing tariffs and easing market access.
content.prelims: India-UK FTA signed to boost trade.
content.mains: Analyze the benefits and challenges of the India-UK FTA.
content.oneLiner: India, UK sign free trade pact.

title: Monsoon Arrives Early in Kerala, IMD Reports

content.detailed: The Indian Meteorological Department announced the early onset of monsoon in Kerala, bringing relief to farmers and water-stressed regions.
content.prelims: Monsoon hits Kerala ahead of schedule.
content.mains: Discuss the impact of early monsoon on agriculture and water resources.

title: GST Council Reduces Tax on EV Batteries

content.detailed: The GST Council has slashed the tax rate on electric vehicle batteries from 18% to 5% to promote green mobility and EV adoption in India.
content.prelims: GST on EV batteries cut to 5%.
content.mains: Evaluate the impact of GST reduction on EV sector growth.

title: India Launches National Quantum Mission

content.detailed: The government has launched the National Quantum Mission to advance research in quantum computing, communication, and cryptography.
content.mains: Discuss the objectives and potential of India's National Quantum Mission.

title: Supreme Court Upholds Reservation for EWS

content.detailed: The Supreme Court has upheld the 10% reservation for Economically Weaker Sections (EWS) in education and government jobs.
content.mains: Critically examine the implications of EWS reservation.

title: India's GDP Grows at 7.2% in Q1

content.detailed: India's GDP growth rate for the first quarter of 2024 stood at 7.2%, driven by strong performance in manufacturing and services.
content.mains: Analyze the factors contributing to India's robust GDP growth.

title: India Hosts G20 Environment Ministers' Meeting

content.detailed: India hosted the G20 Environment Ministers' meeting, focusing on climate change, biodiversity, and sustainable development.
content.prelims: G20 Environment Ministers meet in India.
content.mains: Discuss India's role in global environmental governance.

title: India's Chandrayaan-3 Discovers Water Molecules on Moon

content.detailed: Chandrayaan-3's rover has detected water molecules in the lunar soil, a breakthrough for future lunar missions and research.
content.mains: Explain the significance of Chandrayaan-3's discovery for lunar exploration.

title: India, Japan Sign Defence Technology Pact

content.detailed: India and Japan have signed a defence technology cooperation agreement to jointly develop advanced military systems.
content.mains: Assess the impact of India-Japan defence cooperation.

title: Delhi Implements Odd-Even Scheme to Combat Pollution

content.detailed: Delhi government has reintroduced the odd-even vehicle scheme to reduce air pollution levels during peak smog season.
content.mains: Evaluate the effectiveness of the odd-even scheme in controlling air pollution.

title: India's First Hydrogen Train Flagged Off

content.detailed: Indian Railways has launched its first hydrogen-powered train, marking a step towards green and sustainable transport.
content.prelims: First hydrogen train launched in India.
content.mains: Discuss the benefits of hydrogen trains for India's transport sector.

title: Supreme Court Directs States to Implement Forest Rights Act

content.detailed: The Supreme Court has directed all states to ensure proper implementation of the Forest Rights Act, safeguarding tribal rights.
content.prelims: SC orders states on Forest Rights Act.
content.mains: Examine the challenges in implementing the Forest Rights Act.
content.oneLiner: SC directs states on tribal rights.

title: India's Forex Reserves Hit All-Time High

content.detailed: India's foreign exchange reserves have reached a record $650 billion, strengthening the country's external position.
content.mains: Discuss the significance of rising forex reserves for India.
content.oneLiner: India's forex reserves at all-time high.

title: India Launches National Clean Air Programme 2.0

content.detailed: The government has unveiled NCAP 2.0, aiming to reduce particulate pollution by 40% in 100 cities by 2026.
content.mains: Analyze the objectives and challenges of NCAP 2.0.

title: India, Australia Ink Critical Minerals Partnership

content.detailed: India and Australia have signed a partnership to secure supply chains for critical minerals essential for clean energy technologies.
content.mains: Discuss the importance of critical minerals for India's energy transition.

title: National Education Policy 2020: Implementation Update

content.detailed: The Ministry of Education released an update on NEP 2020 implementation, highlighting progress in curriculum reforms and teacher training.
content.mains: Evaluate the progress and challenges in NEP 2020 implementation.

title: India's First 5G Rural Network Launched in Haryana

content.detailed: India's first 5G rural network has been launched in Haryana, aiming to bridge the digital divide in rural areas.
content.mains: Discuss the impact of 5G on rural development in India.

title: India, France Collaborate on Green Hydrogen

content.detailed: India and France have agreed to collaborate on green hydrogen research and production to accelerate clean energy transition.
content.mains: Analyze the significance of India-France green hydrogen partnership.
content.oneLiner: India, France to work on green hydrogen.

title: India's Tiger Population Rises to 3,500

content.detailed: The latest tiger census shows India's tiger population has increased to 3,500, reflecting successful conservation efforts.
content.mains: Discuss the factors behind India's tiger conservation success.

title: India's First Solar City Inaugurated in Gujarat

content.detailed: Gujarat has inaugurated India's first fully solar-powered city, setting a benchmark for renewable energy adoption.
content.prelims: First solar city launched in Gujarat.
content.mains: Evaluate the impact of solar cities on India's energy goals.
content.oneLiner: Gujarat launches India's first solar city.

title: India's Unemployment Rate Drops to 6.8%

content.detailed: India's unemployment rate has declined to 6.8% in March, attributed to job creation in manufacturing and services.
content.mains: Analyze the trends in India's employment scenario.

title: India's First Indigenous Aircraft Carrier Commissioned

content.detailed: INS Vikrant, India's first indigenous aircraft carrier, has been commissioned, boosting the country's maritime capabilities.
content.mains: Discuss the strategic importance of INS Vikrant for India.

title: India's Startup Ecosystem Ranks 3rd Globally

content.detailed: India has emerged as the third-largest startup ecosystem in the world, with over 100 unicorns and robust funding.
content.mains: Examine the factors driving India's startup growth.
content.oneLiner: India is world's 3rd largest startup hub.

title: India, US Hold 2+2 Ministerial Dialogue

content.detailed: India and the US held the annual 2+2 Ministerial Dialogue, discussing defence, trade, and regional security.
content.mains: Analyze the outcomes of the India-US 2+2 Ministerial Dialogue.

title: India's Wheat Exports Reach Record High

content.detailed: India's wheat exports have touched a record high of 10 million tonnes, driven by global demand and bumper harvest.
content.prelims: Wheat exports hit record 10 mn tonnes.
content.mains: Discuss the implications of rising wheat exports for Indian farmers.
content.oneLiner: India's wheat exports at record high.

title: India's COVID-19 Vaccination Drive Crosses 2 Billion Doses

content.detailed: India's COVID-19 vaccination drive has surpassed 2 billion doses, marking a major public health achievement.
content.mains: Evaluate India's COVID-19 vaccination strategy and its outcomes.
content.oneLiner: India delivers 2 billion COVID vaccine doses.

title: India's Renewable Energy Capacity Crosses 180 GW

content.detailed: India's total renewable energy capacity has crossed 180 GW, with significant contributions from solar and wind power.
content.mains: Discuss India's progress in renewable energy adoption.

title: India's Digital Rupee Pilot Expands to 10 More Cities

content.detailed: The RBI has expanded the digital rupee pilot project to 10 more cities, aiming to test the feasibility of a central bank digital currency.
content.prelims: Digital rupee pilot in 10 more cities.
content.mains: Analyze the prospects and challenges of India's digital rupee.
